title: I'm a new ARMY, but I feel distant to BTS. Why? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on a couple things. -Are you new to the k-pop fandom, or have you been a fan of other groups in the past?How new are you to the fandom? (Days, weeks, months, etc.)Do you know BTS well enough yet?I can’t tell you much because I don’t know what you mean by distant, but I’m going to guess that you’re very new and don’t know BTS super well yet. That’s fine! I suggest that you watch their old concerts, read more into their history, watch more interviews…basically consume more content from them! I think when you become a new fan of a group you feel distant because there are so many fans who know them like the back of their hand, but you’re just kind of left out. Anyway, feel free to ask me any questions about ARMY or BTS.

Because you need to watch them more. And know what they have done in the past. They went thought so much in there past to become what they are known for today. Get to know them more makes u feel likes u and them are kinda similar
